attributes.title: Scared of the orange man
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app a huge orange man busted down my door and lifted me up the ground and said TRUMP FOREVER RATE TRUMP 5 STARS OR FACE ME. I am still terrified of that experience do not download this app so that the orange man stays away

attributes.title: Disgusting app
attributes.review: I opened the app and a loud high pitched ringing noice came out. It made my cats and dogs hypnotized. They then started to attack the doors. They doors finally broke open and in came all sorts of animals. It was TERRIBLE.

attributes.title: Never download this app
attributes.review: I’m perfectly good Internet and this app isn’t working so never download this one I hate it and also ew

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is the worst app i’ve ever used. It’s a scam. I was looking for a reason to vote for Donald Trump in 2020 but this app just proved my point that he is a terrible president and a danger to society. #settleforbiden

attributes.title: NO❤️🙄
attributes.review: this app was not useful, it needs an update, lots a fixing there needs to be, overall I didn’t like it!!!

attributes.title: Annoying
attributes.review: This app has so many bugs it always kicks me out

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: Completely biased news source. Attempted to educate myself on politics and the upcoming election but even I can tell that this is incredibly right-wing and overly biased.

attributes.title: smelly
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app i didn’t think that trump would literally jump out and start beating me into becoming a trump supporter i fought my way out and luckily didn’t fall for it and become a trump supporter this app is very messed up and should be taken down now 😫🥺😭👁👄👁😝 get 🤩 this 🥵 off 👹 the 😴 app 🤐store 🤑stinky tiny peen👿

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER🤢🤮
attributes.review: Trump has become bad and I hate the things he is doing I used to love trump but he’s now trying to ban social media’s and that’s all we have during quarantine

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app is as bad as our president, I don’t this just made me dislike him a little bit more😤😡. And if I could rate this app a .0001 I would
